pullrequest.title: try getting release-tools scripts using curl instead of hg

content.raw:
Sorry for not resolving the problem before. I've installed the mercurial libs into the system at `/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/mercurial` copy the files in the Brew Cellar. It is not a nice solution but should leave a system installation of mercurial working from now on. I can not approve this PR since I think that it will kill the ABI job and does not solve the problem for the rest of the jobs that are not the bottle builders.

I relaunched the [failing job](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder-sierra/39/console).
